programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Five medical students embark on a daring experiment. By stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience, giving them a first hand account of the afterlife. Sci-fi drama based on the 1990 thriller, starring Ellen Page, Diego Luna and Nina Dobrev.

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: Premiere. A gay couple plan for a weekend of mischief, winding up the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a sinister turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more deadly in mind. Thriller, starring Tom Bateman, Sean Teale and Paul McGann.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: My Pet Dinosaur
programme.desc: Premiere. A lad called Jake accidentally makes a new friend thanks to an experiment gone wrong. With the creature evolving every day, the youngster finds it increasingly difficult to keep the new pet a secret from his neighbours. Adventure, starring Jordan Dulieu, Annabel Wolfe and Scott Irwin.

programme.title: Barracuda
programme.desc: The daughter of a country singer travels to Texas looking for her half-sister. Resentments soon grow between the siblings, and new arrival is determined to claim her share of her father's legacy by any means necessary. Drama, starring Allison Tolman and Sophie Reid.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Premiere. Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman. Crime drama based on the Jo Nesbo novel, starring Michael Fassbender, Rebecca Ferguson and Charlotte Gainsbourg.

programme.title: So B. It
programme.desc: A young girl named Heidi travels across the USA to find out about her mother's past. Drama, starring Cloris Leachman, Talitha Eliana Bateman, Jacinda Barrett and Alfre Woodard.

programme.title: Alien Invasion: S.U.M.1
programme.desc: After aggressive aliens take over the Earth, human survivors are forced to live in giant underground bunkers. A young military rookie is sent to the surface to save a group of unprotected survivors. Sci-fi thriller, starring Iwan Rheon, Andre Hennicke and Rainer Werner.

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: Premiere. Seventeen-year-old Elio begins a relationship with Oliver, his father's research assistant in northern Italy. Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg.

programme.title: Tom of Finland
programme.desc: Biopic of erotic artist Touko `Tom' Laaksonen, following him from Second World War soldier struggling to hide his sexuality to gay icon. Starring Pekka Strang, Seumas F Sargent and Chris Myland.

programme.title: The Midnight Man
programme.desc: A teenager and her friend are thrown into a living nightmare when a game they discover in an attic releases a terrifying creature. Horror, starring Robert Englund.(n)

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: A research doctor in a New York psychiatric hospital provokes equal measures of professional interest and suspicion when he appears to have discovered a means of reviving patients who have been trapped in a catatonic state for over 30 years. Fact-based drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert De Niro, Julie Kavner, Penelope Ann Miller, Max von Sydow and Alice Drummond.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: An over-the-hill New York City crooner hopes to make a comeback, while verbally sparring with his thirtysomething daughter. Comedy drama, starring Christopher Walken and Amber Heard.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Upper-class novelist Hubbell Gardiner and Jewish political activist Katie Morosky meet at college in the 1930s and later marry. Although very much in love, their opposing political outlooks lead to conflict when Hubbell's successful career as a Hollywood screenwriter is compromised by his wife's socialist leanings. As the 1950s dawn it becomes clear their differences are too great to overcome. Romantic drama, with Robert Redford, Barbra Streisand, Bradford Dillman and Murray Hamilton.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.

programme.title: Girl Flu
programme.desc: Bird, a 12-year-old girl, endures the worst week of her life when she is ditched by her impulsive, free spirited mother. Comedy, starring Katee Sackhoff, Jade Pettyjohn and Jeremy Sisto.

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: A recently released ex-convict becomes involved with a woman married to an abusive husband. Drama, starring Elisabeth Moss, Waleed Zuaiter and Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: When her husband dies of leukaemia, a Women's Institute member is inspired to raise funds for the local hospital. Casting inhibitions and clothes aside, the widow and her daring friend encourage their fellow members to pose nude for a charity calendar, causing a stir in their Yorkshire village and beyond. Nigel Cole's fact-based comedy drama, starring Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, Annette Crosbie, Celia Imrie and Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: The Grapes of Wrath
programme.desc: When their livelihood is ruined by prolonged drought during the Great Depression, a family of destitute tenant farmers is forced to leave the dust bowl of Oklahoma and undertake a gruelling journey to California in a desperate search for work. John Ford's drama, based on John Steinbeck's novel and starring Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell and John Carradine.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: The Stolen
programme.desc: A woman who has settled in New Zealand with her rich husband during the 19th century must risk everything to find her kidnapped son. Drama, starring Alice Eve, Jack Davenport and Graham McTavish.

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: An aristocratic Englishwoman inherits a vast cattle station in the Australian Outback in the 1930s. When her land comes under threat from a rival farmer aiming to build a monopoly, she is forced to lead her herd across the wilderness to secure the farm's future, falling for a tough stock-man and forming a friendship with a half-Aboriginal boy along the way. However, as they make their journey, the country becomes drawn into the Second World War. Baz Luhrmann's romantic drama, starring Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul
programme.desc: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Stephen Frears drama, starring Judi Dench, Ali Fazal and Tim Pigott-Smith.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
programme.desc: The owner of an ailing golf club aims to raise money by drafting in a former golfing great and holding a high-stakes game. Unfortunately, the player soon realises his form is not what it was - but a mysterious caddy is on hand to dispense words of wisdom and common sense. Robert Redford's drama, starring Matt Damon, Will Smith and Charlize Theron.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul
programme.desc: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Stephen Frears drama, starring Judi Dench, Ali Fazal and Tim Pigott-Smith.

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's fact-based drama chronicles the life of Ron Kovic, an eager-to-impress, patriotic Marine Corps recruit, who endures terrifying experiences during the Vietnam conflict that leave him paralysed from the chest down. On his return home, he undergoes a harrowing journey of physical and mental recovery that leads him to question the whole purpose of the war. Starring Tom Cruise, Willem Dafoe, Kyra Sedgwick and Josh Evans.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A smooth-talking chauffeur employs his natural charm to enjoy a string of casual liaisons with a host of women - but as he tires of his bed-hopping antics, he struggles to work out what is missing from his life. Comedy drama remake, starring Jude Law, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon and Marisa Tomei.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.(n)

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: Residents of a Welsh mining community at the start of the 20th century struggle to come to terms with the decline in their traditional way of life. Oscar-winning drama, starring Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara, Donald Crisp and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond.(n)

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: A troubled Navy recruit is prone to violent outbursts and is ordered to see a psychiatrist, who gradually helps the mentally scarred sailor to come to terms with his past and abusive childhood. Fact-based drama, directed by and starring Denzel Washington. With Derek Luke, Joy Bryant and Salli Richardson.(n)

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: Biopic of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases. Starring Chadwick Boseman and Josh Gad.(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: A man haunted by a tragedy he caused seeks redemption. Assuming his tax inspector brother's identity to gain access to people's private records, he sets out to atone by helping seven seemingly unconnected strangers with their problems - only to fall in love with one of the people he assists. Drama, starring Will Smith, Rosario Dawson, Woody Harrelson and Barry Pepper.(n)

programme.title: Kramer vs Kramer
programme.desc: Ted Kramer takes stock of his life and decides to devote all his time and energy to raising his seven-year-old boy after his wife walks out on them. Things go well for the pair - until she makes an unexpected reappearance and demands sole custody of the child, a move that threatens to tear father and son apart. Oscar-winning drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Meryl Streep, Justin Henry, Jane Alexander, JoBeth Williams and Howard Duff.(n)

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: Biopic of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases. Starring Chadwick Boseman and Josh Gad.(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.(n)

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: A teenage journalist is hired to write about a rock band and joins the group on tour, to the horror of his doting mother. While struggling to meet his deadline, he falls under the spell of the charismatic lead guitarist and a free-spirited groupie - but the youngster is forced to grow up fast before the manic world of rock 'n' roll overwhelms him. 1970s-set comedy drama, with Patrick Fugit, Billy Crudup, Kate Hudson and Frances McDormand.(n)

programme.title: Don't Think Twice
programme.desc: Turmoil strikes a New York improv troupe when one member leaves to star in a Saturday Night Live-style TV show. Comedy, starring Keegan-Michael Key and Gillian Jacobs.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his gang of daredevil friends bring the MTV series to the big screen. As usual, they perform a variety of weird and wonderful stunts, including crawling across dozens of mousetraps while wearing rodent make-up, and being rolled down bowling lanes on skateboards. Comedy, with Bam Margera, Henry Rollins, Spike Jonze and Tony Hawk.

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: The Night is Young
programme.desc: On a booze-fuelled night out, two pairs of downtrodden friends discover that Los Angeles might not be as bad they'd always assumed. Comedy, starring Matt Jones, Dave Hill and Kelen Coleman.

programme.title: Kill Me Three Times
programme.desc: A hitman arrives in an Australian surfing town on a mission. However, he soon discovers he is not the only one plotting to kill his intended target, and gets mixed up in his rivals' stories of murder, blackmail and revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Simon Pegg, Alice Braga, Luke Hemsworth and Bryan Brown.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Four teenage boys make a solemn pact to lose their virginity before the high-school prom, and though their antics cause them huge embarrassment and public humiliation, the friends also learn about love and affection in their relations with the opposite sex. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Chris Klein, Alyson Hannigan, Mena Suvari, Seann William Scott and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Four teenage boys make a solemn pact to lose their virginity before the high-school prom, and though their antics cause them huge embarrassment and public humiliation, the friends also learn about love and affection in their relations with the opposite sex. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Chris Klein, Alyson Hannigan, Mena Suvari, Seann William Scott and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A married couple stuck in a rut try to liven up their relationship with a romantic evening at a popular New York restaurant. They manage to sneak in by claiming someone else's reservation - but the people whose table they take are in debt to gangsters, and hitmen are soon on their trail. Comedy, starring Tina Fey, Steve Carell and Mark Wahlberg.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Another batch of outrageous stunts is lined up by the death-defying friends, who get chased by bulls, used as human shark bait, have leeches attached to their eyes and ride a giant rocket. Comedy sequel, starring Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Steve-O, Chris Pontius and Ryan Dunn.

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: A newlywed couple are in for a rude awakening when they jet off on their dream honeymoon. They are looking forward to an enjoyable tour of Europe - but a series of chaotic events, plus the intervention of the bride's old flame, leaves them at each other's throats and their marriage in tatters. Romantic comedy, with Brittany Murphy, Ashton Kutcher, Christian Kane and David Moscow.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: The friends from East Great Falls High reunite to celebrate Jim and Michelle's forthcoming wedding. Though reluctant to invite Stifler to their big day, the happy couple relent - but regret their decision when he plans a bachelor party on the same evening Jim is due to meet the in-laws. The third instalment in the comedy series, with Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Seann William Scott, Eddie Kaye Thomas and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: The tyrannical ruler of a North African nation travels to New York to address the United Nations, but he ends up stranded in America after a failed assassination attempt masterminded by his brother. He accepts the hospitality of a human rights activist unaware of his identity as he plots his return to power. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Anna Faris and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: The friends from East Great Falls High reunite to celebrate Jim and Michelle's forthcoming wedding. Though reluctant to invite Stifler to their big day, the happy couple relent - but regret their decision when he plans a bachelor party on the same evening Jim is due to meet the in-laws. The third instalment in the comedy series, with Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Seann William Scott, Eddie Kaye Thomas and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: The tyrannical ruler of a North African nation travels to New York to address the United Nations, but he ends up stranded in America after a failed assassination attempt masterminded by his brother. He accepts the hospitality of a human rights activist unaware of his identity as he plots his return to power. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Anna Faris and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Jackass 2.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his foolhardy crew return for another instalment of the anarchic comedy series. The outrageous stunts performed by the group of friends include lying on a bed of nails accompanied by two snakes and riding motor bikes through a shopping mall. With Bam Margera, Steve-O and Chris Pontius.(n)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: A thoroughly ordinary man is hurled into an intergalactic adventure when Earth is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass. Luckily, his friend, who turns out to be an alien, gives him a handy travel guide to help him make sense of the universe. Sci-fi comedy based on Douglas Adams' classic series, with Martin Freeman, Bill Nighy, Mos Def, Zooey Deschanel and Sam Rockwell. Stephen Fry is the guide's narrator.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.(n)

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A lawyer, whose underhand ploys to win cases leave him little time to see his son, discovers he is incapable of lying after the boy's birthday wish makes his dad tell only the truth. However, this causes a host of problems as the attorney tries to muddle his way through a high-profile divorce settlement. Comedy, with Jim Carrey, Maura Tierney, Justin Cooper, Jennifer Tilly and Cary Elwes.(n)

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: A small-time crook hopes to fund a business venture by having his father killed and claiming an inheritance, but finds hiring a hitman is too expensive. He and his sidekick resort to kidnapping a pizza delivery boy, attaching a bomb to him and sending him off to rob a bank on their behalf. However, the scheme does not go to plan. Comedy adventure, with Jesse Eisenberg and Danny McBride.(n)

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two desk-bound incompetent cops live in the shadow of their more daring colleagues. However, when the heroes of the station are killed in a bizarre accident, the bumbling duo get the chance to prove their worth as they stumble across a tycoon's illegal activities. Action comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Steve Coogan and Eva Mendes.(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc: Israeli Special Agent Zohan Dvir grows tired of his dangerous life and longs for a change of scene. While in the process of capturing an enemy activist, Zohan fakes his own death and moves to New York to begin a new life as a hair stylist. He is forced to use his combat training once more to defend his neighbourhood from a crooked landlord and his thugs. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, John Turturro and Emmanuelle Chriqui.(n)

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two desk-bound incompetent cops live in the shadow of their more daring colleagues. However, when the heroes of the station are killed in a bizarre accident, the bumbling duo get the chance to prove their worth as they stumble across a tycoon's illegal activities. Action comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Steve Coogan and Eva Mendes.(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: A former narcotics agent decides it is time to retire and settle down after his partner is killed. However, his peaceful retirement comes to an abrupt end when a villainous drug dealer known as Screwface tries to kill his sister and her daughter. The enraged operative pursues the crime lord to Jamaica in search of vengeance. Action thriller, starring Steven Seagal, Basil Wallace and Joanna Pacula.

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: Willow
programme.desc: A farmer with dreams of becoming a wizard finds an abandoned baby, who is destined to bring about the downfall of an evil queen. The wicked tyrant's minions have been sent to kill the child before she can fulfil the prophecy, and it falls to the would-be sorcerer to protect her, with the aid of a rogue warrior. Fantasy adventure, starring Warwick Davis and Val Kilmer.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A mysterious musician carrying a guitar case full of firearms turns up in a small backwoods town to exact revenge on the drugs baron who killed his girlfriend and permanently injured his hand. Robert Rodriguez's action thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Cheech Marin, Joaquim de Almeida, Steve Buscemi and Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: A drug-addled assassin goes rogue, opting to protect rather than take out his latest target. Action thriller, starring Sam Worthington, Odeya Rush and Allen Leech.

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: An FBI agent risks everything on the trail of masked robbers hitting a series of Cincinnati banks. Crime thriller, starring Christopher Meloni, Bruce Willis and Dave Bautista.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: Willow
programme.desc: A farmer with dreams of becoming a wizard finds an abandoned baby, who is destined to bring about the downfall of an evil queen. The wicked tyrant's minions have been sent to kill the child before she can fulfil the prophecy, and it falls to the would-be sorcerer to protect her, with the aid of a rogue warrior. Fantasy adventure, starring Warwick Davis and Val Kilmer.

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerich's action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerich's action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr.

However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: A US Air Force veteran ejects his co-pilot from their Stealth bomber in a plan to steal the plane's cargo of nuclear warheads. He uses the weapons to extort money from the American government by threatening to detonate one in a major city. Action thriller, starring John Travolta, Christian Slater, Samantha Mathis and Delroy Lindo.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action-horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jensen Ames is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to Terminal Island Prison, a facility that broadcasts the highly profitable Death Race, a high-octane event where convicts battle to the death in customised cars. When a popular driver dies, crooked prison warden Hennessey persuades Ames to take his place, claiming he will be released if he is victorious. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Ian McShane and Tyrese Gibson.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action-horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jensen Ames is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to Terminal Island Prison, a facility that broadcasts the highly profitable Death Race, a high-octane event where convicts battle to the death in customised cars. When a popular driver dies, crooked prison warden Hennessey persuades Ames to take his place, claiming he will be released if he is victorious. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Ian McShane and Tyrese Gibson.(n)

programme.title: After the Storm
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, a private detective struggles to find child support money and reconnect with his son and ex-wife. Comedy drama, starring Hiroshi Abe, Yoko Maki and Satomi Kobayashi. In Japanese.

programme.title: Heaven Knows What
programme.desc: A heroin addict roams the streets of New York trying to raise enough money to support her habit. She remains desperately devoted to her neglectful boyfriend, who drifts in and out of her life, and reaches a turning point in her life after he tries to persuade her to commit suicide. Drama, starring Arielle Holmes and Caleb Landry Jones.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making people's lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents' lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill.

programme.title: Tramontane
programme.desc: A blind Lebanese musician embarks on a journey of self-discovery when learns that his true heritage has been kept from him. Drama, starring Barakat Jabbour, Julia Kassar and Toufic Barakat. In Arabic.

programme.title: Night Fare
programme.desc: When two old friends partying in Paris skip out on a taxi fare they wind up on the wrong side of a manhunt. Thriller, starring Jonathan Howard, Jonathan Demurger and Fanny Valette.

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A fresh-faced Marine's boot-camp training turns into a real tour of duty when he is sent to fight in the Gulf War in 1991. However, the desert action is not what the new recruit expected - the willing soldiers are forced to wait for hours in searing heat, while their day is punctuated by moments of terror. Drama, based on the autobiography by veteran Anthony Swofford, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Jamie Foxx, Peter Sarsgaard and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Queen of Earth
programme.desc: Grieving after the death of her father, a troubled woman retreats to her best friend's lake house and spirals into despair. Psychological thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Katherine Waterston and Patrick Fugit.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.

programme.title: Julieta
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a childhood friend of her estranged daughter causes a guilt-ridden Madrid woman to rethink her future. Pedro Almodovar drama, starring Emma Suarez and Adriana Ugarte.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: A habitual thief and his cop wife are distraught to discover they cannot have children, so set out to kidnap one of five babies born to a local tycoon. However, a relentless bounty hunter is soon on their trail, while two escaped convicts hope to get a reward for returning the child. Coen brothers comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, John Goodman and Frances McDormand.

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.

programme.title: Raw
programme.desc: After a trainee vet and strict vegetarian is pressured into eating meat for the first time, she develops a craving for flesh. Horror, starring Garance Marillier, Ella Rumpf and Rabah Nait Oufella. In French.

programme.title: The Transfiguration
programme.desc: Vampire-obsessed New York orphan Milo finds his disturbing fantasies blurring with reality after forming a bond with another troubled teen. Horror, starring Eric Ruffin, Chloe Levine and Dangelo Bonneli.

programme.title: Pawno
programme.desc: The lives of several residents interconnect when they visit a local pawnshop. Australian comedy drama, starring John Brumpton, Maeve Dermody and Malcolm Kennard.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: An American counter-terrorism unit travels around the world on the lookout for threats to global peace, causing much destruction to major world cities in the process. The biggest current menace is North Korean leader Kim Jong-il and an organisation much closer to home - the Film Actors Guild. Satirical puppet comedy, voiced by South Park creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone.

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest United States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: A bored African prince defies his father's plans for an arranged marriage and escapes to the USA to find a bride on his own terms. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall in several roles, with James Earl Jones, Allison Dean, Eriq La Salle and Madge Sinclair.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: American Wrestler: The Wizard
programme.desc: In 1980, a teenager escapes the unrest in Iran only to face more hostility in America, due to the hostage crisis. Determined to fit in, he joins the school's troubled wrestling team. Drama, starring George Kosturos, William Fichtner and Ali Afshar.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: An American counter-terrorism unit travels around the world on the lookout for threats to global peace, causing much destruction to major world cities in the process. The biggest current menace is North Korean leader Kim Jong-il and an organisation much closer to home - the Film Actors Guild. Satirical puppet comedy, voiced by South Park creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: The story of 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, whose innovative methods of smuggling heroin into the US made him one of the leading figures in the New York underworld. A detective is assigned to bring Lucas's empire down, but his investigation is undermined by police corruption. Ridley Scott's fact-based crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Josh Brolin.

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: A suburban family man has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with a friend of his teenage daughter. Struggling to cope with the unhealthy attention her father is lavishing on her friend, the girl begins a tentative relationship of her own, while her harassed mother is also having an affair. Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley.(n)

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A circus owner hires a celebrated trapeze artist to perform with his girlfriend as the star attraction - leading to bitter rivalry in the air and sexual tension on the ground. Meanwhile, a clown tries to keep his past a secret, and racketeers prepare to muscle in on the concessions. Cecil B DeMille's Oscar-winning drama, starring Charlton Heston, Cornel Wilde, Betty Hutton and James Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Battle for Moscow
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in the Red Army's Rifle Division battle to stop the Nazi advancement toward Moscow in 1941. Wartime drama, starring Maksim Abrosimov, Sergey Agafonov and Pavel Aseev. In Russian.(n)

programme.title: Things to Come
programme.desc: A high-school philosophy teacher is forced to re-examine her life when her husband leaves her for another woman. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert, Andre Marcon and Roman Kolinka. In French, German and English.(n)

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: A baby is born with the physique of a geriatric, and over the course of his lengthy and eventful life he grows steadily younger. A girl he meets in his early years becomes his true love, but as they age in different directions, both realise they have only a limited time to be together. David Fincher's romantic fantasy drama, starring Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Taraji P Henson and Tilda Swinton.(n)

programme.title: Shenandoah
programme.desc: A Virginian farmer is left to raise seven children after his wife dies. He tries to keep his family out of the American Civil War, but when Union troops abduct his son, and his son-in-law enlists with the Confederates, he is unable to maintain his neutral stance and is dragged into the conflict. Western, starring James Stewart, Doug McClure, Rosemary Forsyth, Katharine Ross and Patrick Wayne.(n)

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Trouble brews when King Seretse Khama of Botswana falls for Ruth Williams, a London office worker. Fact-based drama from Belle director Amma Assante, starring David Oyelowo and Rosamund Pike.(n)

programme.title: The Levelling
programme.desc: A trainee vet returns to her family farm after her brother's suicide and attempts to build bridges with her estranged father. Drama, starring Ellie Kendrick, David Troughton and Jack Holden.(n)

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: An American cargo ship sets a dangerous course around the coast of Somalia, while inland, four men are pressed into service as pirates by the local warlords. The captain is taken hostage when the raiding party hijacks the vessel, resulting in a tense five-day crisis. Fact-based thriller, starring Tom Hanks and Barkhad Abdi.(n)

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their peaceful existence. Drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris and Michelle Pfeiffer.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: At the end of high-school segregation in the early 1970s, a black teacher struggles to deal with pressures on and off the pitch as he faces his first season as coach of the now racially integrated American football team. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst, Nicole Ari Parker and Donald Faison.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov.

programme.title: Tex
programme.desc: A teenager struggles against the odds to take care of his younger brother in the aftermath their mother's death. Drama, starring Matt Dillon, Jim Metzler, Meg Tilly, Bill McKinney, Ben Johnson and Emilio Estevez.

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters.

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: The Return of Jafar
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Disney movie Aladdin. Iago unwittingly frees evil Jafar from the genie's lamp, leaving the hero and his magical friend battling against the odds to save the day again. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Jason Alexander, Gilbert Gottfried and Scott Weinger.(n)

programme.title: Mickey, Donald, Goofy: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Three cleaners dream of becoming musketeers - and unexpectedly get the chance to make their wish come true when they are made bodyguards to a princess. However, they do not realise the captain of the guard is plotting to kill her and has given them the job because he thinks they will fail. Animated adventure, with the voices of Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Bill Farmer and Russi Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.(n)

programme.title: Disney's Kim Possible Movie: So the Drama
programme.desc: Feature length adventure of the animated series. The daring teenage heroine has to foil the evil Dr Drakken's fiendish plan to take over the world - but she also has to find a date for the prom. While she is delighted when the new boy at school asks her, her acceptance upsets her friend Ron, and prompts the pair to re-evaluate their feelings for each other. With the voice of Christy Carlson Romano and Will Friedle.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure
programme.desc: The little pup struggles to establish his own identity among his numerous brothers and sisters. He embarks on an exciting escapade across the capital with his favourite TV star, but the sinister Cruella DeVil returns to cause more havoc. Animated sequel, with the voices of Bobby Lockwood, Barry Bostwick, Jason Alexander, Martin Short and Sam West.(n)

programme.title: Mulan

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.(n)

programme.title: Throne of Elves
programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes.

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.

programme.title: Louis & Luca - The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: The Easter bunny's son is about to take over the chocolate-delivering business, but rejects his responsibilities and heads for Hollywood to seek fame and fortune as a drummer. He makes life difficult for the directionless slacker who takes him in, but they must work together to avert a crisis on Easter island. Part-animated comedy, starring James Marsden, with the voice of Russell Brand.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
programme.desc: Youngster Greg Heffley hatches a plot to re-route a family road trip towards a videogame convention. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Drucker, Alicia Silverstone and Tom Everett Scott.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets.

programme.title: Blinky Bill: The Movie
programme.desc: A koala embarks on an epic adventure to find his missing father, teaming up with some pals and venturing into the dangerous Outback. Animated adventure, with the voices of Billy Birmingham, Toni Collette and Charlotte Rose Hamlyn.

programme.title: Cop and a Half: New Recruit
programme.desc: A veteran detective teams with a tech-savvy 12-year-old to take down serial prankster the Badge Bandit. Family adventure, with Lou Diamond Phillips and Lulu Wilson.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart.

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid fleeing an arranged marriage becomes stranded at a beach resort. There she meets two local girls - lifelong friends about to be separated when one of them moves to Australia - and seeks their help in winning the heart of a lifeguard she has fallen for. In return, she promises to grant them their wish to stay together. Fantasy comedy, with Sara Paxton, Emma Roberts and Joanna Levesque.

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Overworked estate agent Jim Evers takes his beleaguered family to look round an isolated, crumbling mansion - but the resident ghosts are not especially pleased to see the visitors. Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.

programme.title: Toys
programme.desc: A dying toy-maker leaves the company to his brother, a power-mad general, who turns the friendly family factory over to the production of weapons. It falls to the general's zany nephew and his equally childlike sister to stand up for their father's benign world-view. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack and Donald O'Connor.

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.

programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl struggles to cope with the torments of growing up, fitting in and finding a boyfriend. Tired of being a social outcast, she plans to throw the perfect birthday party to win the respect of her peers. Comedy drama based on Louise Rennison's series of novels, starring Georgia Groome, Alan Davies, Karen Taylor and Aaron Taylor-Johnson.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake.(n)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Dismissed from the Anti-Villain League after botching a mission, Gru sets off to meet his long-lost twin brother. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker.(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.(n)
